context_of_use: This use case allows users to view and download general and sales reports for analysis and record-keeping.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: access to reports for personal use and analysis
power user: ability to analyze data offline through downloaded reports
admin: monitor business performance through access to sales reports
description: This use case enables users to view and download reports for analysis and record-keeping.
triggering_event: User requests to view or download reports.
preconditions: User is authenticated and authorized to access reports.
postconditions: User successfully views or downloads the requested reports.
Reports are accurately displayed and available for download.
assumptions: Users have the necessary permissions to access the reports.
requirements_met: The system shall allow users to view reports.
The system shall allow users to download reports.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of reports available for viewing and downloading.
main_flow: 2. customer → System allows customer to select a report to view.
3. customer → System displays the selected report.
4. power user → System allows power user to download the report.
5. admin → System allows admin to view sales reports.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 1): If no reports are available, then System displays a message indicating no reports are available.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 1): If the user is not authenticated, then System displays an error message and prompts for login.
